channel.title: Attacking an NPC has an effect
channel.description:
Hey. This is kinda embarresing to ask but... How do I make it when I kill an NPC it has an effect? Im making a Pest Control Mini Game and need to know the answer to my question. I got something, and got [b][glow=red,2,300]1[/glow][/b] error. I kinda dont wanna post what I put... But I will anyways. I know I got something wrong, cause the = true out of the () isnt right...
[code] if ("PlayerId" is attacking (npcId == 1)) = true {[/code]
If you could help thatd be great. Thanks. [br][size=1]Posted on: February 21, 2007, 09:21:46 PM[/size][hr]Crap... Ya, I answer a lot of other people's questions... No one helps me with mine... :P
